front.title: Internet X.509 Public Key Infrastructure Subject Identification Method (SIM)

abstract.t: This document defines the Subject Identification Method (SIM) for including a privacy-sensitive identifier in the subjectAltName extension of a certificate.</t><t> The SIM is an optional feature that may be used by relying parties to determine whether the subject of a particular certificate is also the person corresponding to a particular sensitive identifier.
